original_text:
who by a word make a man out to be an offender,
    and lay a snare for him who reproves in the gate,
    and with an empty plea turn aside him who is in the right.
korean_text: 그들은 송사로 사람에게 죄를 씌우며 성문에서 판단하는 자를 올무로 잡듯 하며 헛된 일로 의인을 억울하게 하느니라

sentences.original_text: who by a word make a man out to be an offender
and lay a snare for him who reproves in the gate
and with an empty plea turn aside him who is in the right.
